name: 蘇春𤂌
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。介紹產品製造的程序和各種加工方法，及使用的機械設備、製造過程材料及製程參數的影響，製程規劃及製造成本的因素、產品檢驗量測技術及品質管制的方法、製程自動化及電腦整合製造系統等。食材簡介。
schedule:
教材大綱/Syllabus：
Week 1: Introduction(0, Metals (1)
Week 2: MechProp(2), PhysProp(3)
Week 3: Alloys(4-6)
Week 4: Metal Casting(10-12)
Week 5: Plastics(7, 19), Composites(9, 19)
Week 6: Powder(17), Ceramics(8, 18)
Week 7: Metal Forming(13, 14, 15)
Week 8: Metalworking(16)
Week 9:　　Midterm Exam 
Week 10: Machining(21-24), Tool(25)
Week 11: Grinding(26), Advanced machining(27)
Week 12: Welding(30, 31)
Week 13: Mechanical assembly(32), RP(20)
Week 14: IC(28, 29)
Week 15: Surface(33, 34)
Week 16: Metrology(35, 36)
Week 17: Introduction to food components
Week 18:　　Final Exam
materials:
Possible Textbook: 
1.Manufacturing Engineering and Technology, S. Kalpakjian & S. R. Schmid, Pearson, 2014.
2. V.A. Vaclavik, E.W. Christian,"Essentials of Food Science", Springer, 4th ed, 2014
Reference:   1.　　Materials & Processes in Manufacturing, J. T. Black & R. A. Kohser, Wiley, 2013.
2.　　Principles of Modern Manufacturing, 5/e, M. P. Groover, Wiley, 2013.
